feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.36.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Fix priority handling by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3313
  • [client] Use GPO DNS Policy Config to configure DNS if present by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3319

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.36.6...v0.36.7

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.37.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Normalize DNS record names to lowercase in local handler update by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3323
  • [signal] add pprof and message size metrics by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3337
  • [management] Refactor users to use store methods by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2917
  • [management] Add batching support for SaveUsers and SaveGroups by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3341
  • [client][ui] added accessible tray icons by @karsa-mistmere in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3335
  • [misc] Run management benchmark jobs on file changes by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3343
  • [client] [ui] issue when changing setting in GUI while peer session is expired by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3334
  • [signal] Fix registry not found by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3342
  • [management] remove gorm preparestmt from all DB connections by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3292
  • [client] Set up local dns policy additionally if a gpo policy is detected by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3336
  • [management] optimize test execution by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3204
  • [client][ui] Use go build to embed less icons by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3351
  • [misc] improvement(template): add traefik labels to relay by @cesargoncalves in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3333
  • [client] Add UI client event notifications by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3207
  • [client, management] Support DNS Labels for Peer Addressing by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3252
  • [client] Add embeddable library by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3239
  • [client] Skip CLI session expired notifcation if notifications are disabled by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3266
  • [management] refactor auth by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3296
  • [client] Interface code cleaning by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3358
  • [misc] Update README.md by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3360
  • [management,client,signal] Update google.golang.org/api to latest by @paralin in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3288
  • [misc][Snyk] Security upgrade alpine from 3.21.0 to 3.21.3 by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3359
  • [client] Add reverse dns zone by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3217
  • [management] fix grpc new account by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3361
  • [client] Add netbird ui improvements by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3222
  • [client] Fix udp forwarder deadline by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3364
  • [misc] Rename client tests in CI by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3366

New Contributors

  • @karsa-mistmere made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3335
  • @cesargoncalves made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3333

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.36.7...v0.37.0

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.37.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Restart netbird-ui post-install in linux deb&rpm by @mohamed-essam in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2992
  • [client] Update local interface addresses when gathering candidates by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3324
  • [management] faster server bootstrap by @pnmcosta in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3365
  • [client] fix privacy warning on macOS by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3350
  • [client] Disable notifications by default by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3375

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.37.0...v0.37.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.37.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] fix extra DNS labels parameter to Register method in client by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3371
  • [tests] Retry mysql store creation on reused containers by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3370
  • [client] Replace string to netip.Prefix by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3362
  • [misc] Replace webinar link by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3380
  • [management] Handle transaction error on peer deletion by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3387
  • [misc] Fix typo by @Silex in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3415
  • [client] Add Netbird GitHub link to the client ui about sub menu by @robertgro in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3372
  • [client] Close userspace firewall properly by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3426
  • [client] UI Refactor Icon Paths by @hakansa in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3420
  • [client] Handle large DNS packets in dns route resolution by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3441
  • Update bug-issue-report.md template by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3449
  • [client] Fix TURN-Relay switch by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3456
  • [client] Print out the goroutine id by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3433
  • [misc] Traefik config improvements by @Silex in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3346
  • [misc] Grafana dashboards by @muzammil360 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3458

New Contributors

  • @Silex made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3415
  • @robertgro made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3372
  • @muzammil360 made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/3458

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.37.1...v0.37.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.38.0
entry.content:
Release notes

This release fixes a few bugs with client startup where the client could get blocked in case of settings changes in the GUI and improves the Network monitor lifecycle trigger to avoid race conditions. It also adds an initial client support for a new feature called Ingress ports that should allow users to enable port forwarding in the future and port-range access control policies.

New features

  • [client, management] Add Ingress ports initial support #3275

Enhancements

  • [client] Enable windows stderr logs by default #3476
  • [docs] Fix typo #3477
  • [client] Prevent panic in case of double close call #3475
  • [client] Prevent to block channel writing #3474
  • [client] Add option to autostart netbird ui in the Windows installer #3469
  • [client] Fix engine restart race condition #3435
  • [client] Ignore candidates that are part of the the wireguard subnet #3472
  • [client] Increase local daemon connection timeout to 50 sec #3481
  • [management] return empty array instead of null on networks endpoints #3480

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.37.2...v0.38.0
